answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello James,
ICMA has a couple of documents on pay-as-you-throw waste disposal in our documents section.
This one comes from the Colorado Municipal League:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2596/Pay_As_You_Throw
And this one from an old issue of Public Management:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7459/Pay_As_You_Throw_One_Step_Closer_to_a_Sustainable_Future
Hope these help.

author: James Jackson
text:
I am looking for examples of RFPs requesting environmental firms conduct a solid waste study to assist in determining the feasibility of developing a "pay-as-you-throw" recycling and solid waste program.
Any assistance in this search would be greatly appreciated!
You may send repsonses directly to me at jajack561@yahoo.com
title: Pay-As-You-Throw Waste Management
